mentions.context: Duplicated reads were removed using PICARD.
All statistical analyses were performed using the SNP & Variation Suite (v8.8.1; Golden Helix, Inc., Bozeman, MT, USA) and MedCalc, version 19.5.3 (MedCalc Software, Ostend, Belgium).
Statistical analyses for RT-q-PCR were done using the CFX Maestro software.
In order to generate Wiggle (WIG) and Tiled Data Format (TDF) files, HOMER (4.7) [8] and Integrative Genomics Viewer (2.3.67) [9] were used.
In order to generate Wiggle (WIG) and Tiled Data Format (TDF) files, HOMER (4.7) [8] and Integrative Genomics Viewer (2.3.67) [9] were used.
All statistical analyses were performed using the SNP & Variation Suite (v8.8.1; Golden Helix, Inc., Bozeman, MT, USA) and MedCalc, version 19.5.3 (MedCalc Software, Ostend, Belgium).
